text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well. How about you?
I am great, just enjoying some coffee on my deck. How is the weather for you?
It's cloudy a lot, but otherwise fine. I was just looking through the morning mail. A request by a children's charity for a donation.
Which charity was the flyer from? The charity I always donate to is called Save The Children. They do wonders for under privileged kids.
I think it was from Save The Children. So you think they do some actual good?
They do for sure. They feed so Many starving kids and are quick to respond to any crisis.
That's encouraging. Do you usually donate? They're asking for $50, I was thinking more like $20.
I do donate regularly to them. In fact if you are wanting to donate you can donate a portion of your payment from this directly to Save The Children. Is that something you would be willing to do?
That's a thought. I guess I could do that. Maybe 1/2 of the payment.
That is wonderful! So you are willing to donate half of your payment? I will also donate mine.
Okay. Let's do that then.
Great! These donations will be able to help so many children!
That's the goal, for sure.
It absolutely is! I just want to thank you for helping out this great charity.
Glad to help. I have a needy child of my own, and know how desperate that can make you feel.
Absolutely! I hope you enjoy your day, and if you would like to learn more about this charity, you can visit their website.
I may do that. Enjoy your day also.
Thank you!
You are welcome.
